meta.description: New guidelines recommend that cats and dogs exposed to rabies who are overdue for a vaccine are to be given a booster shot, followed by an observation period.

title: New Guidelines for Pets That Are Overdue for Rabies Boosters
cleaned_text: Thankfully, the veterinary community has issued new guidelines for the handling of pets overdue for a rabies booster who are exposed to the virus

opengraph.title: New Guidelines for Pets That Are Overdue for Rabies Boosters
opengraph.description: New guidelines recommend that cats and dogs exposed to rabies who are overdue for a vaccine are to be given a booster shot, followed by an observation period.
